messages.message:
:blob-wave: <!here> I'm going to be restarting *Prod Jenkins* to apply updates in ~an hour, around *12:00 PST*.

Let me know if you have any objections to that timing - otherwise the outage should be brief!

Heads-up this has been paused for a bit, handling a couple of other higher priorities issues first - don't want to muddy the waters with more moving parts than are required. :slightly_smiling_face:

Will post again when I'm ready to restart Prod Jenkins.

Ok, applying Prod Jenkins updates momentarily - outage should be on the order of a few minutes only, but it's a somewhat larger change set than usual. I'll keep an eye on it and let y'all know here if anything goes sideways on me, and please do the same if you find something misbehaving afterward! :+1:
:white_check_mark: Looks like the upgrade went smoothly from my end! Let me know if you see evidence to the contrary. :-)
